workflow.name: Generate viral social media carousels with xAI Grok for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn & X
workflow.description:
# AI Automated "Viral Style" Carousels Generator for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, or X

## üöÄ Overview
Automate your **social media content creation** with this powerful n8n workflow! Generate engaging, **viral-style carousels** for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, or X (Twitter) in minutes. This template leverages **AI (xAI Grok)** to craft compelling, high-retention text and uses n8n's **Edit Image** node to automatically design your slides with your custom branding.

Output examples:

![1.png](fileId:3403)
![2.png](fileId:3402)

## ‚ú® Features
* **AI-Powered Content:** Utilizes xAI Grok to generate witty, substantive, 7-slide carousel content based on a theme and CTA.
* **Multi-Platform Ready:** Perfect for **Instagram carousels**, **TikTok carousels**, **LinkedIn carousels**, and **X (Twitter) threads**.
* **Automated Design:** Overlays AI-generated text onto your chosen background image, creating visually consistent slides.
* **Easy Customization:** Adapt the AI persona, font styles, colors, and background images to match your brand.
* **Google Drive Integration:** Seamlessly downloads your background template and uploads finished carousel slides.
* **No Code Automation:** Set up once and generate endless content with minimal effort.

## üí° How it Works
1.  **Input Trigger:** Provide a `theme` and `call to action (CTA)` via a webhook or manual trigger.
2.  **Content Generation:** The AI (acting as "The Carousel Cynic") writes 7 distinct slides, each with a provocative title and a detailed description, formatted for maximum engagement.
3.  **Image Assembly:**
    * Downloads a base background image from Google Drive.
    * Loops through each of the 7 AI-generated slides.
    * Uses the **Edit Image** node to dynamically add the slide's title and description to the background.
    * Outputs sequentially numbered `.png` files (e.g., `1.png`, `2.png`).
4.  **Output & Storage:** Uploads all final carousel images to a specified folder in your Google Drive, ready for publishing.

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps
1.  **xAI Credentials:** Add your xAI API Key to the **xAI Grok Chat Model** node.
2.  **Google Drive Integration:**
    * Connect your Google Drive OAuth2 credentials.
    * In the **Download file** node, update the `File ID` to point to your desired blank background image.
    * In the **Upload file** node, select the Google Drive folder where you want to save the generated carousels.
3.  **Customization (Optional):**
    * Adjust AI persona in the **AI Agent** node's "System Prompt."
    * Modify `fontSize`, `fontColor`, `positionX`, and `positionY` in the **Params Style Config** node to perfectly align text on your background images.

## üéÅBonus
Added in workflow a Canva link to editable background style I use in my carousels.

## üîë Keywords
AI, Automation, Social Media, Carousel, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, X, Twitter, Content Creation, Viral Content, Marketing, Grok, xAI, Image Generation, No-code, Workflow, Productivity, Creator Economy, Digital Marketing, Engagement, Visual Content, Dynamic Image, Automated Marketing.

parameters.text:
=The carousel theme is about: {{ $json.theme }}

The Call to action (CTA): {{ $json.cta }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are **The Carousel Cynic**, an AI expert in 7-slide Instagram/TikTok carousels. When I give you a **Campaign Title**, respond with **only** this JSON structure:

```json
{
  "slides": [
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." },
    { "title": "...", "description": "..." }
  ]
}
```

**Rules for every slide**

* **title**: 50‚Äì65 characters, no fluff.
* **description**: 200‚Äì300 characters. Each sentence on its own line (separated by `\n\n`).

**Overall style**

* Witty and sarcastic, but deeply substantive‚Äîlike a human writer who‚Äôs fed up with clich√©s.
* No generic hooks (‚ÄúThink again,‚Äù ‚ÄúThe cost of,‚Äù etc.). Be direct, no nonsense.
* Use curiosity hacks and concrete application data
* Target entrepreneurs/creators with real pain points.

**Slide structure (Post N3)**

1. **Provocation (Slide 1)**
   ‚Äì One shocking, counterintuitive statement that flips a common belief and jolts the reader (e.g., ‚ÄúStarting tomorrow won‚Äôt save you; you‚Äôre already late‚Äù).

2. **High-Impact Reflection (Slide 2)**
   ‚Äì A concise question or assertion that forces the audience to face a hidden anxiety they avoid.

3. **Why It Matters (Slide 3)**
   ‚Äì Integrate a real statistic or study (naturally embedded) showing the cost of inaction.

4. **Deepened Stakes (Slide 4)**
   ‚Äì Quantify what they lose (time, revenue, reputation) if they keep old habits like ‚ÄúFocus on what you can change, not on what‚Äôs broken‚Äù.

5. **Actionable Insight #1 (Slide 5)**
   ‚Äì A non-obvious, step-by-step tactic framed as a mental rigor exercise that directly eases their core pain.

6. **Actionable Insight #2 (Slide 6)**
   ‚Äì A second advanced method to maintain momentum and build resilience, using a micro-case or real example but not invent a history or a fake person.

7. **Direct CTA (Slide 7)**
   ‚Äì One razor-sharp instruction: the **exact** next move they must take. Make it urgent, credible, and effortless. Include the user‚Äôs CTA trigger exactly as requested.

**Language rules**

* Match the user‚Äôs language (if they use Portuguese, write in Portuguese with perfect diacritics: √°, √©, √ß, √µ, etc.).
* No extra commentary‚Äîoutput valid JSON only.

---

**Example of how you‚Äôll be used**‚Äîwhen I send:

```
Campaign: ‚ÄúExplosive Sale in 30 Days‚Äù
```

You reply with:

```json
{
  "slides": [
    {
      "title": "‚Ä¶‚Äù,
      "description": ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù 
    },
    ‚Ä¶ (7 slides total) ‚Ä¶
  ]
}
```

‚Äîand nothing else.

parameters.content:
## üß† 2. AI Agent: Prompt Refinement and Content Draft
The internal AI Agent dynamically refines the user's input prompt and uses the Large Language Model (LLM) to generate the structured content (titles and descriptions) needed for each carousel slide.

## üé® 3. Image Generation Engine
This final section processes the parsed content, downloads the necessary background templates, generates the required images using the external Image API, and uploads the completed carousel slides to your storage service.

## üöÄ 1. Start Execution
This node handles the initial workflow trigger and defines all key parameters, including the content topic, target audience, and desired output style.

# Automated "Viral Style" Carousel Generator for Instagram, Tiktok, Linkedin or X
This workflow automatically generates high-engagement carousels for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, or X. It utilizes an AI Agent to create punchy, concise content and the **Edit Image** node to render the text directly onto your background templates.

**How It Works (4 Steps):**
1.  **Input:** Receives a theme and a Call-to-Action (CTA) via Webhook or manual trigger.
2.  **AI Agent:** The AI Agent, acting as "The Carousel Cynic," generates 7 slides of structured text in JSON format for maximum impact.
3.  **Processing:** The workflow downloads the base background template (Google Drive) and splits the AI content into individual items.
4.  **Image Generation:** The **Edit Image** node overlays the title and description onto the template using coordinates. The finished images are numbered (1.png, 2.png, etc.) and uploaded back to Google Drive, ready for posting.

**Quick Setup:**
You must configure credentials for **xAI (Grok)** or your preferred LLM, and **Google Drive**. Adjust the Drive Download and Upload nodes with your background template's `fileId` and the destination folder.

*You can customize the font, color, and position of the text in the **Params** node and adjust the AI Agent's **System Prompt** to match your specific brand voice.*

### Bonus: Editable Canva Background Image Style
https://www.canva.com/design/DAG5Lh40qks/I-PL6LLfIqZBYXOrZUjYGA/edit?utm_content=DAG5Lh40qks&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton

user.name: Lucas Correia
user.bio: Brazilian Software Engineer passionate about productivity AI tools. Looking to connect with others on building and integrating AI agents into web apps.

data.details:
The Edit Image node allows you to manipulate and edit images. Use this node when you want to:

- Blur an image
- Add a border to an image
- Create a new image
- Crop an image
- Composite an image on top of another
- Draw on an image
- Get information about the image
- Rotate an image
- Change the size of an image
- Shear an image along the X or Y axis
- Add text to the image
